noun.description: A flake of snow, especially a feathery ice crystal, typically displaying delicate sixfold symmetry.
An overly sensitive or easily offended person, or one who believes they are entitled to special treatment on account of their supposedly unique characteristics.
examples: these little snowflakes will soon discover that life doesn't come with trigger warnings
these parents think their kid is such a special snowflake that they should be allowed to circumvent the rules

noun.description: A white-flowered Eurasian plant related to and resembling the snowdrop, typically blooming in the summer or autumn.
